titles.title: O God, our help in ages past

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O God, our help in ages past, Our hope for years to come, Our shelter from the stormy blast, And our eternal home.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Under the shadow of Thy throne Thy saints have dwelt secure; Sufficient is Thine arm alone, And our defence is sure

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Before the hills in order stood, Or earth received her frame, From everlasting Thou art God, To endless years the same.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: A thousand ages in Thy sight Are like an evening gone; Short as the watch that ends the night Before the rising sun.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Time, like an ever-rolling stream, Bears all its sons away; They fly forgotten, as a dream Dies at the opening day.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: O God, our help in ages past, Our hope for years to come, Be Thou our guard while life shall last, And our eternal home.
